recipes.label: Delving To Hidden Depths.
recipes.startdescription: Our path leads through c'thonic depths. There is a way down, even if I must make it myself. Approach this with the practicality of Forge or the voluptuousness of Grail.
recipes.description: Our path leads through c'thonic depths. There is a way down, even if I must make it myself. Approach this with the practicality of Forge or the voluptuousness of Grail.

slots.label: 协助
slots.description: 器具可用于实现我之目标。

recipes.label: Ministrations of Parting
recipes.startdescription: We coax ourselves into the earth. The earth shall open to us as it does to the Beachcomber. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Yielding Touches
recipes.startdescription: We ply ourselves into the earth, and like so many others, it yields to our touch. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Soft Demands
recipes.startdescription: We wriggle our way down, where our greed and curiosity lead us.  We may yet succeed

recipes.label: The Diamond Road
recipes.startdescription: Down is the direction of the molten core. If anything is in my way, I shall shatter it like the Forge shattered the Flint. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: The Graphite Roads
recipes.startdescription: Down is the direction of secret fire. If there is no path, I shall forge one.  We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: The Coal Roads
recipes.startdescription: Down is the direction of earthly wealth. If obstacles are in my way, I will break them.  We may yet succeed
